Comment 2: 
<- str1ngs IRC. I agree shell escaping is not very safe.

So far I like the cgo directives, but I was wondering if it could be expanded by having
a PKG_LDFLAGS: and PKG_CFLAGS: cgo directive. Where it would sanely handle pkg-config
--libs and --cflags. And fall-back to LDFLAGS: CFLAGS: if it does not exist?
